description: A sporty mid-layer for hiking: the Madris ML Jacket Men. The special mid-layer material stands out with its double-weave construction, which has windproof properties and provides increased comfort. Water-repellent thanks to PFC-free DWR coating. Easy to combine for a layered look. The Madris ML Jacket Men: protects on hikes and in everyday life.
name: Mammut Madris ML Jacket - Mens
